git.commitMessage:
feat: Add comprehensive social features - blocking, LFG status, friend expiration

- Add player blocking system with database schema, backend handlers, and UI
  - Block/unblock players from profile modal
  - Blocks prevent friend requests and direct messages
  - Blocking removes existing friendships and pending requests

- Add "Looking for Game" (LFG) status feature
  - Toggle in Online tab to signal you're looking for teammates
  - LFG players display animated badge in online player list
  - LFG status broadcasts to all connected clients

- Add friend request expiration (30-day auto-expire)
  - New expires_at column in friend_requests table
  - Hourly scheduled task cleans up expired requests
  - Cancel sent friend request functionality

- Enhance notification center integration
  - Add friend_request_accepted notification type
  - Sync notification types between frontend and backend

sprint18.name: Side Betting System
features: Side betting system for players and spectators
Preset bets with auto-resolution (red 0 winner, brown 0 victim, bet made, etc.)
Custom bets with manual resolution and dispute handling
Side bets panel integrated in game header
